title: Reference: Assessor-Recorder Property Class Codes
description: Property class code reference dataset for the Assessor-Recorder historical secured property tax dataset. https://data.sfgov.org/d/wv5m-vpq2 Use codes are a superset of property class codes. Both codes include definitions.

columns.name: Use Code
columns.description: Use Codes group together related property class codes. They are defined by the field Use Definition. See also the field "Property Class Code."

columns.name: Use Definition
columns.description: The definition for the field "Use Code."

columns.name: Class Code
columns.description:
Property type code defined in the field "Class Definition." 

Please note, VCIX was truncated in the source and at the time records marked VCI could be VCIX. This is a rare code and indicates vacant land with restrictions as opposed to without.

columns.name: Class Definition
columns.description:
Property type definition (name) based that defines the code in the field "Class Code."

Please note, the property use code VCIX was truncated in the source and at the time records marked VCI could be VCIX. This is a rare code and indicates vacant land with restrictions as opposed to without.
